description: It's time for Cody to get laid again, and this week, we feed him the all new Asian beauty Miko Sinz.As an aspiring photographer, Miko wanted to shoot Cody. Of course the Italian Stallion had no problem what so ever letting the petite hottie take a few snap of him, so we gave her one of our cameras and left the two alone for a bit. When we came back, the clothes we off and these two were really making it hot! Miko just couldn't resist places that fat cock of his on her tongue and he couldn't keep his dick out of her! After giving Miko a pounding she'll never forget, Cody drenches her back with his man milk.All in a days work!Enjoy!
title: The Asian Persuasion!
